about_the_game:
EXPLORE. COLLECT. BATTLE.



Animal Game is a 3D monster collector RPG that parodies popular titles in the genre. Explore, collect and battle across huge biomes with over 100 unique never-before-seen Battle Buddies, like the mighty Bear, the clever Octopus or the intimidating Goose.

EXPLORE

⦁ Discover massive zones teeming with life! Whether you're a Desert dweller, a City slicker or a friend of the Forest, you'll feel right at home in this strange new world.
⦁ Wander off to find special items and Buddies by completing side quests - or tackle the main mission head on and defeat the Gang Galactic.

COLLECT

⦁ Build a team of Battle Buddies that fit your preferred playstyle - or just fill your party with your favorite little guys.
⦁ Challenge yourself to catch over 100 unique Buddies, or hunt down the Special versions of each!

BATTLE

⦁ Focus on your team's synergies in this dynamic double battle system.
⦁ Innovative combat with abilities that increase in power when you wait to use them!
⦁ Manage your Stamina wisely to support your allies or set up devastating combos.
⦁ Discover a unique status effect system that encourages exciting strategies! Melt your enemies with Poison, outsmart your enemies with Stealth, or satisfy your bloodlust with a heavy-hitting Bleed team.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5GHz / AMD A10-7800 APU 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that can make monke noises
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 360 or equivalent.
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that can make BIG MONKE noises

short_description: A 3D turn-based creature collector RPG where you catch and battle unimaginable creatures after being sent to a strange new world. Experience the full story mode as you fight through bad guys - and various bystanders - in a reimagined 2v2 battle system that adds new elements to classic RPG combat.
